## Top info bar intlv.topbar.search.placeholder=Find pages in graphâ€¦ intlv.topbar.search.title=Find pages from the visualized graph intlv.topbar.graphinfo.hint=Displays information about graph intlv.topbar.search.options.allPages=All Pages intlv.topbar.search.options.allPages.title=Show all pages, even if excluded from the navigation
## Main graph area intlv.sigmacontainer.buttons.title.zoomin=Zoom In intlv.sigmacontainer.buttons.title.zoomout=Zoom Out intlv.sigmacontainer.buttons.title.iterations=Increase Graph Iterations: If graph is not layouted properly & need more iterations intlv.sigmacontainer.buttons.title.zoomdefault=Default Zoom intlv.sigmacontainer.buttons.title.fullscreen=Fullscreen intlv.sigmacontainer.buttons.title.killgraph=Kill Graph Instance intlv.sigmacontainer.form.title.documentfilter=Number of documents to display in graph intlv.sigmacontainer.form.label.documentfilter=No. of pages to visualize:
## Local graph panel intlv.panel.header=Linked Pages Graph
